title: looking to trade my OJ Sam Thompson
author: ghostmarcelle

posts.post_title: looking to trade my OJ Sam Thompson
posts.post_content: I have duplicates of this N172 Sam Thompson and am looking to trade one of them for a different pose - 456-1 "strike, ball chest high".  I am not too particular on condition, but need the image to be good.  I would trade either of these cards depending on the deal.
